title: Thresh's lantern bug?
body: So is Thresh's lantern supposed to disappear if someone is using teleport on it? Tried to save my ADC with it and top TP'd onto it and she couldn't click it.

replies.body:
Yeah because that would also change where the laner is teleporting to. In the same way that a minion stops moving if someone teleports to it, the lantern can't move during the channel. 

Pretty sure that's working as intended
Ok  i'm picking up what youre putting down good sir.
